title: Mastercraft 13 Piece Tap And Drill Bit Set -
description: 13 piece tap and drill bit set includes 6 of the most popular taps and matching drill bits, with one tap wrench. Set allows you to always have the precise drill bit needed for each of the taps. Bits are titanium-coated. Includes a heavy duty carrying case to keep the set organized.

title: Black & Decker Play Work Bench, 50-Pcs -
description: Black & Decker Play Work Bench features realistic power tools to help build your very own tool box. Durable enough to withstand toddler play. Large surface workbench play area. Set comes with battery operated drill press, flashlight, and chop-saw. Suitable for ages 3+. Includes 50 pieces.

title: Dewalt 20V Max XR Lithium Ion Brushless Compact Hammerdrill & Impact Driver Combo Kit  -
description: This combo kit includes a Hammer drill and impact driver that feature the Dewalt brushless motor that delivers up to 57-percent more run time over brushed. Both tools feature LED lights with 20 second trigger release delay providing increased visibility in dark or confined spaces. Backed by a Dewalt 3 year limited warranty for added peace of mind.

title: Makita 4 Piece 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Combo Kit -
description: Makita's 4-Piece Combo Kit includes core tools to handle most projects. It includes a 1/2 In. Cordless Hammer Driver Drill; 1/4 In. Cordless Impact Driver; Cordless Reciprocating Saw and 6-1/2 In. Cordless Circular Saw. Lithium-Ion batteries ensure both power and performance to maximize your productivity. Add versatility, power and reliability to your tool box.

title: Ridgid 7.5 Amp 1/2 In. VRS Hammer Drill  -
description: The RIDGID 1/2 In. VRS Hammer Drill features a heavy-duty 1/2 In. keyed chuck and all metal design for durability and positive bit retention; a durable 7.5 AMP motor with hardened steel gears for long life; automatic clutch to reduce the stress load on motor and gearing, and a dual speed/torque gearbox that allows the user to set the drilling speed to match the application. An ergonomic soft grip handle also provides comfort and decreased vibration, while the 360 degree auxiliary handle assembly with depth-stop rod provides precise control of drilling depth. Also includes heavy-duty contractor bag.

title: Ryobi One+ 18V Lithium-Ion Drill Kit -
description: The RYOBI 3/8" Drill/Driver features a 2-speed gearbox for high torque or high speed appications. It also features a 3/8" keyless chuck for easy bit changes. The 24 position clutch adjusts the torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. Like other RYOBI products the 18v Drill/Driver features a MAGTRAY, which holds scews bits and other harware magnetically for easy access. The drill lastley features GRIPZONE, an overmold for optimum grip and user comfort. ONE+ Battery is comapatible with all RYOBI ONE+ items.

title: Dinotrux Reptool Revvit -
description: Work and play like a favorite Dinotrux character! Reptool Revvit from the Mechazoic Era is ready to roll into fun on wheels that mimic his movement on the animated show. Complete with unique Reptool sounds and phrases, he features a tail-activated spinning drill head with interchangeable bits and a real measuring tape tongue.

title: Bosch 18-Volt 1/2-In Variable Speed Cordless Compact Drill/Driver -
description: With the compact and lightweight design, professionals can drill or drive fasteners overhead or in tight spaces fatigue-free. This drill is ideal for electricians, plumbers, and HVAC tradesman looking for a solution that not only fits in their pouch, but can handle most everyday tasks. The drill features two speeds, 350 in-lbs of torque, and 1,300 RPM for a broad array of fastening and drilling applications. The tool is compatible with the Bosch Flexible Power Systemâ„¢, which means it can work with either SlimPack or FatPack batteries.

title: Bosch 2-Tool 18-Volt Lithium Ion Cordless 1/2-In Hammer Drill/Driver And 1/4-In Hex Impact Driver Combo Kit -
description: HDS181: Durashield housing - constructed to withstand jobsite conditions.

title: Bosch 2-Tool 18-Volt Lithium-Ion Cordless Combo Kit -
description: This 1/2-in compact drill/driver and impact driver combo kit uses advanced lithium-ion technology for greater battery life and more runtime, all in a lighter package. The drill/driver is ideal for electricians, plumbers, and HVAC tradesman looking for a solution that not only fits in their pouch, but can handle most everyday tasks. The impact driver features an ultra-compact design, while delivering professional-grade application control. Plumbers, electricians, carpenters, HVAC professionals, and other tradesmen can take advantage of the tool's compact size for hard-to-reach spaces and optimized performance for fast and great results.

title: Dewalt 12-Volt Max Cordless Lithium Ion Drill/Driver And Impact Driver Combo Kit -
description: Drill/driver features a 2-speed transmission (0-400 / 0-1,500) for optimal speed and toque control on most applications.

title: Dewalt 18-Volt 1/2-In Variable Speed Cordless Compact Drill/Driver Kit -
description: Compact size fits into the tightest conditions.

title: Dewalt 18-Volt Cordless Drill/Driver And Impact Driver Combo Kit -
description: Compact size and weight allows access into tighter areas and reduces user fatigue.

title: Dewalt 2 12-Volt Max 3/8-In Cordless Drill/Driver Kit -
description: Compact, lightweight design fits into tight areas and reduces user fatigue.
